name: Safair Operations (Pty) Ltd
about: Safair Operations (Pty) Ltd, established in 1965 as Tropair (Pty) Ltd, is a renowned specialist in aviation services. With over 50 years of experience, Safair has evolved into a leading provider of charter, leasing, and specialized airlift operations. The company operates a diverse fleet, including Boeing 737s and Lockheed L-100 Hercules, and has a strong history of supporting humanitarian aid, environmental conservation, and search and rescue missions. Safair is also the parent company of FlySafair, a low-cost passenger airline. Known for its excellence and reliability, Safair continues to deliver world-class solutions in some of the worldâ€™s most demanding environments. With a commitment to safety and a "can do" attitude, Safair remains at the forefront of specialized aviation services.
